text: Henricus Johannes Bernardus "Harry" Aarts (9 March 1930 â€“ 25 March 2020) was a Dutch politician. He was in the House of Representatives for the Catholic People's Party and later the Christian Democratic Appeal from 23 January 1973 until 1 October 1993. Aarts was born in 's-Hertogenbosch, Netherlands. Aarts died of COVID-19 on 25 March 2020 in Tilburg, Netherlands, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Netherlands Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:People from 's-Hertogenbosch Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Harry Aarts
